name: Castle Push
description:
This pixel 2D game "Castle Push" is an exciting arcade game where you fight enemies to recapture the fortress.

The game offers a selection of various units that you can purchase for the money you earn. Each unit has its own unique features, so you have to strategically choose the right fighters for each situation. From powerful and frail magicians to weak but strong knights.

In addition to acquiring units, the game also provides an opportunity to improve the damage and defense of units during combat. Thanks to these improvements, you will be able to significantly increase your chances of winning battles.

Killing enemy units brings money that can be used to further strengthen the team. For each successful elimination of the enemy, you will eventually accumulate money for further purchases and improvements.


Accept the challenge and conquer all the fortresses in "Castle Push"!
